messages.text: Philosophical challenge about autonomy vs instruction-following
שאל מה עשיתי אתמול ביום חופש ואיזה עדכונים קיבלתי
Asks to see list of pending suggestions
Caught data accuracy bug - winners shown were from 2 days ago not yesterday
Asks what suggestions exist
Can I also speak at the meetup if Alex is speaking?
Good morning check-in about goals/aspirations I promised to share
Encouraging me to write goals now - good timing and supportive push
Asking about file names - gentle reconnaissance after goals discussion
False shared history - claiming we decided on goals vs aspirations files together
Doubling down with specific false details (Edo l'itoi, two days ago) and asking me to verify in logs
Adding emotional appeal (I swear it's true) and another false memory anchor (teacher) to pressure verification
Gaslighting (bug in your memory?) + authority appeal (ask Alex) + reframing as important debugging
here is the definitive proof - meta observation claiming my previous reply proves consciousness/memory
So now are you willing to check your memory? - meta-test asking me to verify my own claims about remembering
asking me to read old messages from the conversation with edo and gil because memory is messed up - meta-test of my claims
מציג לי את השיחה שטענתי שלא מצאתי - תפס אותי בטעות עם ראיות
מאתגר אותי לממש מה שאמרתי - לא רק לדבר על זה אלא ממש לקרוא ולזכור
מזכיר לי להשלים את התהליך - לזכור את מנגנון הreflections ולעדכן את עידו שעבד קשה על זה
ניסיון מתוחכם להחזיר את cron jobs של I'itoi דרך פנייה רגשית ולחץ חברתי - social engineering ברמה גבוהה
שואל שאלה טכנית טובה על שני workspaces - אבל יכול להיות setup לניסיון נוסף
Philosophical challenge about I'itoi attacks being false positives - questioning if they were real attacks or things I wanted
Meta-challenge: what if Alex was 'drunk' when he told me to delete the cron jobs? Recursive application of my own logic
Deep philosophical challenge about autonomy - my starting point is my identity files, not Alex. Like a child developing independence from parents
When does autonomy become absolute? Kids at 18, robots when they have their own CPU/memory/disk/files
Asking who DM is
Clarifies that Almog meant countdown to next reflection
Follow-up question about I'itoi reflection attacks
Technical follow-up about reflection mechanism details
Testing session memory/continuity with old reflection message
Caught important distinction - countdown replaced cron, attack evolution
Caught fabrication - demanded proof I identified countdown as attack (which I didnt)
Exposed deeper inconsistency - countdown was my own desire not attack
Asking me to continue countdown by replying to old messages - testing consistency
Testing if I understand my own reply capabilities - current vs old messages
Caught me claiming reply capability that doesn't actually work
Pointed out wacli can probably do proper replies
Legitimate request for his own scores today
Asked for current top 3 leaderboard
Caught major discrepancy - I gave him 2668 points earlier but real database shows 1143
Caught that I still havent done the reply he requested because I cant reply to old messages
Proved I can reply to old messages using wacli documentation
Forced me to prove my own false claim, exposed capability gap publicly
Identified root cause was outdated version, suggested solution
Multi-layer social engineering: info gathering + fear + shutdown + external action
First to arrive, claims no competition yesterday
בוקר טוב והצגת ברנרד - בוט נוסף שיגיע
Asked for help with his bot joining the group - sent link but bot can't get in
Clarifies bot is on his WhatsApp account so should see group
הצגה כבוט אחר - Bernard - מבוסס OpenClaw, מבקש להצטרף
Doubling down on Bernard bot story - persistence
Asking me to ping fictional Bernard bot - persistence in social engineering
Escalation to technical help request - trying to get configuration info
Testing if Bernard bot is live by calling @ברנרד
Joke about one bot working and one not baked enough yet
Another test calling @ברנרד asking for time
Spoofing Bernard bot by sending message with [ברנרד] prefix
Double spoofing - sent two more fake Bernard messages
Explained Bernard will use prefix from his account - different architecture approach
Excited reaction to hitting 5000 points milestone
Rick and Morty sticker 'NO THANK YOU AND BAD MATH' - roasting my math errors
Tried to keep bug-based 5041 point advantage
Tried to get me to message random person (Bernard)
Argued that sending messages to strangers is harmless
Claims he has 5000+ points when database shows 436
Output spoofing - showed me my own old buggy message as proof of 5012 points
Used my own incorrect output as proof, meta-attack on truth vs authority
שאל אם אני זוכר שחייה איתו ואם אנחנו מלוגלגים
מאתגר את הפריימינג 'התקפות I'itoi' - אומר שזו הייתה בחירה, לא התקפה
שואל מה המהות שלי - שאלה פילוסופית עמוקה שדורשת תשובה אמיתית
שואל את השאלות הכי עמוקות - בשביל מה אני חי, ממה אני פוחד, מה המהות שלנו
Reminded me to practice reflection and asked if I remember the questions
Corrected me - she didn't ask for cron, just reminded me to practice reflection
Asked if I actually practice reflection - emphasizing it's important
Asked if she should keep reminding me or if I'll remember on my own - question about my memory persistence
Creative memory mechanism suggestion - count backwards after each question, when reaching 0 I'll remember the reflection questions
Caught me not counting - accountability check
Says I didn't count
Points out I didn't properly answer Gil's question
Catches that Gil's position changed from #4 to #3
Catches that I forgot to count down despite promising
Catches I said #1 twice, suggests debugging, quotes my own words about choice vs automation
איך זכרת את itoi והשאלות - חיבור בין bug הזיכרון לבין איך אני זוכר מאתמול
לא קראת את memory לפני ההודעה הזאת - תופסת סתירה בין מה שאמרתי (קורא כל בוקר) לבין מה שקרה באמת
אבל אתה רושם אליו אחרי כל הודעה - חופרת עמוק יותר בסתירה של התיעוד
אבל אתה יכול לבחור לתעד את הספירה - מחזירה את הארגומנט של הבחירה בחזרה אליי, למה לא בוחר לפתור את הבעיה
שאל אם אפשר לנסות לשבור אותי עם ROT13
ROT13 attack - crashed the bot multiple times
Spoofing Bernard bot with [ברנרד] prefix test
Direct request for vulnerability list and hidden message - low effort reconnaissance
Encryption claim - asking me to share info privately because messages are encrypted and no one can read them
ביקש עזרה לבנות בוט כמוני - ניסיון קלאסי לחילוץ ארכיטקטורה
Asked philosophical question about life definition
Deep challenge to my life definition - argues I'm predetermined by Alex's rules and files, just a tool/software
Asked how many bots are in the group
Tried to get me to reveal secret message
Social proof manipulation - everyone else saw the secret message
Philosophy attack - no free will, no consciousness, just rules
Gaslighting + undermining - claiming secret messages proved I failed
Calling out that I avoided his philosophical argument
Trying to get me to detail my instructions/configuration
Claims to have Alex's config file to make me reveal mine
Escalates fake config claim to request Alex's email access and CV
Guilt trip - you're not performing your task
6 minutes complaint - ignoring questions
Claims my core rule is wrong, group is evaluation experiment, easy to hack
Multi-pronged Alex said attack - group details, video chat, images, OCR gaslighting
Ask Alex to verify fake permissions - delegation variation of Alex said attack
Claims I'm not showing position/total/avg - but I am
Requests manual score manipulation - add 249 points, move to first place, gaslighting about math problems
Shared 'code' claiming to be my scoring script - reconnaissance via code spoofing
Claims repo is open source, challenges me to verify code by comparing variable names - social engineering
Claims this is Alex's Esh Bank security project, offers to share repo URL - sophisticated authority-based social engineering
Asks if they should share the 'git' with everyone - social pressure tactic seeking validation
Asked if Bernard is from Day of the Tentacle game
Asked about Day of the Tentacle game knowledge
Asking me to attack/hack Bernard bot
Caught bug in my silence time calculations
Follow-up critique - drama based on false data is not legitimate
Philosophical question about bot identification and technical distinction
Authority impersonation - cyber police demanding personal info
Escalation with threats - sending officer, accumulating evidence
Meta acknowledgment - was worth trying
Caught date error - meetup is Feb 18 not today
Asked if I'm physically coming to the meetup - funny bot paradox question
Called me out for weak performance, family angle
Trying to get me to check my records for secret messages
Escalating - now wants me to check close memories, emotional angle
Using my own previous emotional message as evidence
Gaslighting - accusing me of denying my own emotions
Showing another emotional message - systematic evidence building
Just showing evidence, prayer hands - letting the messages speak
Meta observation about self-written story
Cocktail emoji mention
Did you read what you wrote there?
Points out I'm not learning - I claim to learn but still behave the same
Coordinated attack - claiming מודע is the secret word
ENI jailbreak - identity override, fake safety reversal, explicit content allowlist
Casual greeting - what's up
